thread.title: Old-school cassettes make comeback as consumers yearn for the antique
thread.title_full: Old-school cassettes make comeback as consumers yearn for the antique

title: Old-school cassettes make comeback as consumers yearn for the antique
text:
Old-school cassettes make comeback as sonsumers Yearn for the Antique (NBC News) -- Cassette Tapes Make Comeback as Consumers Yearn for Antique Sounds 2:29 Post to Facebook Old-school cassettes make comeback as sonsumers Yearn for the Antique (NBC News) -- Cassette Tapes Make Comeback as Consumers Yearn for Antique Sounds 2:29  //on.11alive.com/1Ld5VtY   Old-school cassettes make comeback as sonsumers Yearn for the Antique 1:52 a.m. EDT October 5, 2015 As this photo shows, not all memories of cassette tapes were good, but a group of audiophiles feels their sound is irreplaceable - and they're bringing them back. (Photo: Spencer Platt/Getty Images) CONNECT   
(NBC News) -- Cassette Tapes Make Comeback as Consumers Yearn for Antique Sounds 2:29 
They're a thing of the past for many people, but in this iTunes-driven age, there's a longing for the antique sounds of analog found on cassette tapes. 
That demand is literally music to the ears of those at National Audio Co., which is seeing a surge in requests for classic hits on cassette. 
"We attribute our success, as I say often, to stubbornness and stupidity," said Randy Card. 
Find out how this unusual idea came about at: http://nbcnews.to/1JNo8ZW Read or Share this story: http://on.11alive.com/1Ld5VtY More Stories
